LanguageData.AS_WAE_ElvenBowResearch.label: Ancient Elven Bow Crafting Research
LanguageData.AS_WAE_ElvenBowResearch.description: Technical research on ancient Elven basic bows. Allows you to craft Elven Bows commonly used by Ancient Elves.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_LowMeleeWeaponResearch.label: Ancient Elven Melee Weapon Research
LanguageData.AS_WAE_MidMeleeWeaponResearch.label: Ancient Elven Melee Weapon Research 2
LanguageData.AS_WAE_MidMeleeWeaponResearch.descriptio: Development of more combat-friendly weapons from primitive weapons.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_RelicKnightsSwordWeaponResearch.d: Research of the sword of ancient elven lore once wielded by the hero who saved the planet. Upon completion, you will be able to craft the Ancient Elven Knight Sword.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_BasicApparelsResearch.label: Ancient Elven Apparel Technology Research
LanguageData.AS_WAE_BasicApparelsResearch.description: Research on clothing commonly used by ancient elves.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_BasicArmorResearch.label: Ancient Elven Armor Technology Research
LanguageData.AS_WAE_BasicArmorResearch.description: Research on armor commonly used by ancient elves.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_MidArmorResearch.label: Ancient Elven Advanced Armor Technology Research
LanguageData.AS_WAE_MidArmorResearch.description: A study of the armor used by the higher ranks of the ancient Elves.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_NobleEquipmentResearch.label: Ancient Elven Noble Equipment Technology Research
LanguageData.AS_WAE_NobleEquipmentResearch.descriptio: Research on clothing used by ancient Elven nobles and high-level knights.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_HighArmorResearch.label: Ancient Elven High Armor Technology Research
LanguageData.AS_WAE_HighArmorResearch.description: Research on armor used by the highest elite knights among the ancient elves.
